astudio [command]

Commands:
  astudio help [command]         Show help for a command
  astudio dev [target]           Start development servers
  astudio build [target]         Build targets
  astudio test [suite]           Run test suites
  astudio mcp                    MCP server utilities
  astudio tokens <command>       Generate or validate design tokens
  astudio versions <command>     Sync version metadata across workspace
  astudio components new <name>  Generate a new UI component
  astudio lint                   Run lint checks
  astudio format                 Format code or check formatting
  astudio doctor                 Check environment and repo health

Options:
      --version   Print version                                                            [boolean]
  -q, --quiet     Errors only                                                              [boolean]
  -v, --verbose   More detail + timings                                                    [boolean]
  -d, --debug     Internal diagnostics                                                     [boolean]
      --json      Machine output (single JSON object)                                      [boolean]
      --plain     Stable line-based output                                                 [boolean]
      --no-color  Disable color                                                            [boolean]
      --no-input  Disable prompts                                                          [boolean]
      --exec      Allow external command execution                                         [boolean]
      --network   Allow network access                                                     [boolean]
      --cwd       Run as if from this directory                                             [string]
      --config    Config file override                                                      [string]
      --dry-run   Preview without changes                                                  [boolean]
  -h, --help      Show help                                                                [boolean]
